verses.1: Kei tawh a kiho vantungmi mah hong paikik a, a ihmu kimlai a kiphong bang keekin kei hong khanglosak hi.
verses.2: Amah in, “Bang na mu hiam?” ci-in hong dong hi. Kei zong, “Kham tawh a kibawl meivak khuam khat ka mu hi. Tua meivak khuam in meivak sagih nei a, meivak tui koih nading hai khat zong a khuam dawnah om hi. Tua meivak sagihte in meivak khau nei ciat uh hi.
verses.3: Meivak khuam gei ah oliv kung nih zong om a, meivak khuam lang tuakah om uh hi,” ci-in ka dawng hi.
verses.4: Tua ciangin kei zong vantungmi kiangah, “Sia aw, hihte bang a cihnopna ahi hiam?” ci-in ka dot ciangin
verses.5: amah in, “A cihnopna thei lo na hi hiam?” ci-in hong dawng a, kei zong, “Sia aw, ka thei kei hi,” ci-in ka dawngkik hi.
verses.6: Tua ciangin vantungmi in kei kiangah, “ Topa in Zerubbabel tungah hih bangin thu gen hi: Galkap tam neihna hang hi lo, nangma vangliatna hang zong hi lo, keima tung panin na ngah vangliatna bek tawh na ma na tun zo ding hi.
verses.7: Thuhaksa pente nangawn in na ma hong khaktan zo lo ding hi. Biakinn na lamkik dinga, a khupna suang na cian laitakin, mite in ‘Hoih mahmah hi,’ ci-in awng ngeingai ding uh hi, hong ci hi,” a ci hi.
verses.8: Topa in kei tungah thu hong gen hi.
verses.9: Amah in, “Zerubbabel in biakinn bulpi phut khin a, biakinn lam zong a zo ding hi. Tua ciangin ka mite in, amaute kiangah nang kong sawlna thu hong thei ding uh hi.
verses.10: A maa uh a telh loh manun ka mite lungkia uh a, ahi zongin Zerubbabel in biakinn lam nasep a makaihna a muh uh ciangin a lung uh damkik ding hi,” hong ci hi. Vantungmi in, “Meivak sagihte pen, leitung khempeuh a etna Topaʼ mittang sagih ahi hi,” hong ci hi.
verses.11: Tua ciangin kei zong ama kiangah, “Meivak khuam pang tuak a om oliv kung nihte bang a cihnopna ahi hiam?
verses.12: Oliv thau a luan khiatna kham tuizawl nihteʼ gei-a om oliv hiang nihte bang a cihnopna ahi hiam?” ci-in ka dong hi.
verses.13: Amah in, “Thei lo na hi hiam?” ci-in hong dong a, kei zong, “Sia aw, thei kei ing,” ci-in ka dawng hi.
verses.14: Tua ciangin amah in, “Leitung khempeuhʼ Topaʼ na a sem dingin Pasian in teelin sathau a nilh mi nihte a cihnopna ahi hi,” hong ci hi.
